showScoreExcerpt:
"The show pulsates with the funky Latin beat that's made Gloria Estefan the music world's major crossover success. It's also got a schmaltzy and inspiring storyâ€¦Flaws notwithstanding, this is one of those sincere, uplift stories people like to identify with.
